api_list.name: Server Telemetry Statistics
api_list.description:
Returns assistant telemetry metrics from a server within a specific timeframe.

The min and max params must be base64 encoded datetime strings in the following format: 2021-08-01 01:00, the date range cannot be bigger than 7 days

**Requires the *USER_ELEVATED* scope to be used when obtaining the key used on this request (thus, you must either be a Donator of a Verified User on the website)**

api_list.name: Availability
api_list.description:
Returns space availability
**Requires the *USER_ELEVATED* scope to be used when obtaining the key used on this request (thus, you must either be a Donator of a Verified User on the website)**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com/v4/node/availability"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com/v4/node/availability"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Server Ping
api_list.description: Returns information about online players, MOTD etc, if available
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com/v4/server/0/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com/v4/server/{serverid}/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List variant version tags
api_list.description: Lists tags (java versions) for a specific variant version
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com/v4/variant/0/0"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com/v4/variant/{variantid}/{versionid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com"
